control_attributes.Control: IR-5 (1) AUTOMATED TRACKING / DATA COLLECTION / ANALYSIS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to assist in the tracking of security incidents and in the collection and analysis of incident information.

Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to assist in the tracking of security incidents and in the collection and analysis of incident information.
